    • Uses of RayConfiguration in com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer.utils.rays

      Classes in com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer.utils.rays that implement RayConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CentralRayWithWhiskersConfiguration<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<T>>
      A CentralRayWithWhiskersConfiguration uses a long central ray and two shorter whiskers.
      class  ParallelSideRayConfiguration<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<T>>
      A ParallelSideRayConfiguration uses two rays parallel to the direction of motion.
      class  RayConfigurationBase<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<T>>
      RayConfigurationBase is the base class for concrete ray configurations having a fixed number of rays.
      class  SingleRayConfiguration<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<T>>
      As the name suggests, a SingleRayConfiguration uses just one ray cast.
